text: The 400s was a decade that started on 1 January 400 and ended on 31 December 409. ==Events== * Constantine III seizes control of the Roman garrison in Britain, declares himself emperor, and crosses into Gaul. * August 22, 408 â€“ Stilicho, military power behind the imperial throne, is executed. The Roman military is leaderless for several years until Constantius III becomes patrician. * Construction (and therefore occupation) at Great Zimbabwe begins. * Validity limit for the information on Eastern Roman Empire in the Notitia Dignitatum.
title: 400s
